{"step_by_step_thinking": "The lymphatic drainage of the lower lip-middle part can be determined by understanding the lymphatic drainage patterns in the head and neck region. The lymphatic vessels from the lower lip-middle part drain into the submental nodes, which are located beneath the chin. From the submental nodes, the lymph then continues to drain into the submandibular nodes, which are located along the lower border of the mandible. Therefore, the correct answer is B. Submental nodes.", "answer_choice": "B"}
